terms.term1: I understand that my funds are held securely on this device, not by a company.
terms.term2: I understand that if this app is moved to another device or deleted, my funds can only be recovered with the recovery phrase.
terms.term3: I have read, understood, and agreed to the Terms of Use.

errorAmountInRange.tooBig: The amount is higher than the exchange maximum of %{max} %{symbol}
errorAmountInRange.tooSmall: The amount is lower than the exchange minimum of %{min} %{symbol}

swapSelection.noSwappableCoin: Sorry, you don't have any Swappable Asset

swapCompleted.title: Swap

addToken.title: Add Asset
addToken.note: Disable assets to hide them from your portfolio.

rnsCreateName.title: Create Nickname
rnsCreateName.nameUnavailable: Sorry, The nickname entered is not available

confirmNotice.one: Please confirm that you would like to create nicknames for below 1 wallet.
confirmNotice.other: Please confirm that you would like to create nicknames for below {{count}} wallets.

rnsStatus.failed: Failed! Your nickname is failed to register.

keyName.title: Wallet Name
keyName.question: What do you call this wallet?
keyName.notice: You can change the name displayed on the device below.
keyName.name: Name
keyName.comment: * Wallet name can contain 1-%{maxLength} letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), and space

rename.title: Your Name
rename.question: What's your name?
rename.comment: * Name can contain 1-%{maxLength} letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), and space

unableRecover.title: Unable to recover
unableRecover.body: We are unable to import a wallet with your recovery phrase. Please make sure the phrase is correct.

duplicatePhrase.title: Duplicate Phrase
duplicatePhrase.body: This phrase is already imported in the app. Please try with a different phrase.

tooManyPhrase.title: Too Many Words
tooManyPhrase.body: The recovery phrase has to be 12 words.

amountExceeds.title: Not enough balance
amountExceeds.body: The amount entered exceeds the wallet's balance

txFailed.title: Transfer is failed
txFailed.moreBTC: You need more BTC balance to complete the transfer
txFailed.moreRBTC: You need more RBTC balance to complete the transfer
txFailed.moreRIF: You need more RIF balance to complete the transfer
txFailed.moreBalance: You need more balance to complete the transfer

guardPhrase.title: Safeguard your recovery phrase
guardPhrase.body: Your recovery phrase is composed of 12 randomly selected words. Please carefully write down each word in the order they appear.

incorrectBackupPhrase.title: Incorrect backup phrase
incorrectBackupPhrase.body: It's important that you write your recovery phrase down correctly. If something happens to your wallet, you'll need it to recover your money. Please review and try again.

phraseCopied.title: Copied
phraseCopied.body: The recovery phrase has been copied to the clipboard.

addressCopied.title: Copied
addressCopied.body: The address has been copied to the clipboard.

subdomainCopied.title: Copied
subdomainCopied.body: The nickname has been copied to the clipboard.

txIdCopied.title: Copied
txIdCopied.body: The Transaction ID has been copied to the clipboard.

passcode.oldIncorrect: Old Passcode is incorrect, try again
passcode.notMatched: Passcode does not match. Please try again.

fingerprint.title: Touch Sensor
fingerprint.nativeNote: Scan your fingerprint on the device scanner to continue
fingerprint.notMatch: Fingerprint does not match. Please try again.

faceID.title: Face ID
faceID.nativeNote: Please aim at the camera for face recognition
faceID.notMatch: FaceID does not match. Please try again.

biometrics.title: Biometrics
biometrics.notMatch: Biometrics does not match. Please try again.

createPasscode.title: Please set a passcode
createPasscode.body: Passcode can protect your funds if this device is stolen or compromised by malicious software.

deleteKey.title: Warning!
deleteKey.body: Are you sure you want to delete all assets using this wallet?

swap.title: No swappable coin
swap.body: Swap supports BTC, RBTC and DOC. Please add asset.

contractNotFound.title: ERC20 Contract Not Found
contractNotFound.body: We cannot find the input ERC20 token smart contract. Please check if it is right.

duplicateToken.title: Duplicate Token
duplicateToken.body: This token is already added in the wallet. Please try with a different token.

dappWarning.title: Redirecting to third-party Dapp "%{dappName}"
dappWarning.body:
%{description}

Note: You will be redirected to a thrid-party Dapp "%{dappName}". Please go through the User Agreement and Privacy Policy of the third-party Dapp carefully. "%{dappName}" will reserve full responsibility for all actions and usage on the Dapp.

noWalletAvailable.title: No Wallet Available
noWalletAvailable.body: There is no wallet available for this Dapp yet. Please navigate to Wallet Creation page to either create or import a wallet first.

requestTimeout.title: Request timeout
requestTimeout.body: The server could not complete the request within the specified time.

rnsNameUnavailable.title: RNS nickname unavailable
rnsNameUnavailable.body: Below entered nicknames are unavailable. Please try again with different nicknames.

rnsSubdomainNotFound.title: RNS Nickname Not Found
rnsSubdomainNotFound.body: RNS nickname is not found in server.

rnsNewFeature.title: Send & Receive got easier
rnsNewFeature.body: We've launched support for RNS, or RIF Name Service which enables the identification of blockchain addresses by human-readable names.

balanceInvalid.title: Wallet balance is not available
balanceInvalid.body: We are having problem retrieving your wallet balance. Please try again later.

InvalidTokenSymbol.title: Invalid token symbol
InvalidTokenSymbol.body: A same token symbol already exists on this blockchain.

rnsExceeded.title: Maximum number reached
rnsExceeded.body: No more than {{count}} nicknames can be created per day.

networkError.title: Network Error
networkError.body: Your device can not connect to the server.
